definition: a wise man looks after his own hide (idiom)/to put one's own safety before matters of principle
Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods
wise/a sage
(used in given names)/variant of 哲[zhe2]
Bulgaria/Bulgarian/abbr. for 保加利亞|保加利亚[Bao3 jia1 li4 ya4]
to defend/to protect/to keep/to guarantee/to ensure/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)
body/life/oneself/personally/one's morality and conduct/the main part of a structure or body/pregnant/classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset/Kangxi radical 158

sentences.english: To be wordly-wise and play safe is one of the manifestations of liberalism.
sentences.chinese: 明哲保身是自由主义的表现之一。

sentences.english: The other one is compromise and to adopt the strategy named keeping out of troubles.
sentences.chinese: 再一种就是妥协，采取明哲保身的策略。

sentences.english: The trouble with us Chinese is that we are too sensible.
sentences.chinese: 我们中国人的弱点是太懂得明哲保身了。

definition: lit. see the wind and set the helm (idiom); fig. to act pragmatically/to be flexible and take advantage of the situation
to play deaf-mute
to have a clear view of things/to adapt to circumstances
not to get involved/to stay out of it
Only an outstanding talent can recognize current trends (idiom). A wise man submits to circumstances.
pinyin: shi2 shi2 wu4 zhe3 wei4 jun4 jie2

definition: to conceal one's strengths and bide one's time (idiom)/to hide one's light under a bushel
to keep the peace; to patch up a quarrel (idiom)
it is better to avoid unnecessary trouble (idiom)/the less complications the better
pinyin: duo1 yi1 shi4 bu4 ru2 shao3 yi1 shi4

definition: to take the big picture into consideration (idiom)/to work for the benefits of all
to curry favor (idiom); playing up to those in power/social climbing
to feel unconcerned and let matters rest (idiom)
pinyin: shi4 bu4 guan1 ji3 , gao1 gao1 gua4 qi3

definition: to try to smooth things over/to paper over the issues/to gloss things over
way of life/attitude/modus operandi
to accept a compromise
the shot hits the bird that pokes its head out (idiom)/nonconformity gets punished
to fight for fame, grab profit (idiom); scrambling for fame and wealth/only interested in personal gain
